column2: Within each disparity grouping of neighborhoods
column3: the median is determined as the point at which half the neighborhood data values are lower and half are higher

column1: Y Axis Title: Percent of Households  (Median of Neighborhoods)
Indicator Name: Households reporting air conditioning
Indicator How Calculated: Estimated number of households in an area reporting having functioning air conditioning divided by the number of households in the area; expressed as percent.
Indicator Source(s): New York City Housing and Vacancy Survey (HVS)

Linked Indicator How Calculated: Neighborhoods are ranked according to the percent of people whose annual income falls below 100% of the federal poverty level. Rankings are then divided into 3 approximately equal groupings of low medium and high poverty.
Linked Indicator Source(s): American Community Survey
NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene
More information can be found at: http://nyc.gov/health/tracking
